# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) 
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0) and steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5) and transport belts (positions x=63.5, y=-53.5 and x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that entities have the necessary ingredients before using them
### Errors when using steam engine without connection
- Ensure that steam engine is connected to the power grid before using it
### Errors when using electricity group without being plugged into electric network
- Ensure that electricity group is plugged into the electric network before using it
### Errors when using pipe group without fluid
- Ensure that pipe group has fluid before using it
### Errors when using belt group without items
- Ensure that belt group has items before using it

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables have been defined or invoked in the given execution logs.
